description.english: Skip the prologue and exit outside...

displayName.english: We've Such Sights To Show You...

description.english: Enter Fort Ninevus and finish the game.
Get sobered up by Meredith's spell.
Threaten the soldiers to let you through.
Don't let Yarvin off the hook.
Meet Vivian Deveraux at the Smoky Stag.
Reject Meredith's advances in the Cabin.
Embrace Meredith's advances in the Cabin.
Complete the introductory CYOA by making it to the end.
Discuss the Captain's and Meredith's shared history.
Learn about the abandoned Mage Tower.
Learn about the Vigilants' supply depot.
Learn about the jobs & notices board.

displayName.english: Put That Pep In Your Step!

description.english: Take a swig from your trusty flask!
Unlock all the game's steamy scenes.
Give Meredith her first foot massage.
Give Meredith her second foot massage.
Unlock all banter events in the first area.
Unlock all banter events in the second area.
Talk to a gossiping guard 25 or more times.
Pray at both Shrines of Sollarius.

displayName.english: I Spy With My Little Eye...

description.english: Find all 3 secret vendors in the world!
Return to Ninevus from the Wildlands.
Find and dig up the secret stash Lizbeth told you about.
Find and dig up the Legion wargear stash Tolliver told you about.
Lockpick all 6 doors in Ninevus South without any of them jamming or breaking.
Peruse the Library at the Legionnaire's Lodge at least 10 times.
Refuse to hand over the grimoire to Sabrine.
Sleep in a local bed at least once.
Loot all weapon stands in the starting area.
Complete all tracking events in the starting area.
Complete all tutorials in the starting area.
Try to enter Captain Hale's cabin.
Try to enter the abandoned Mage Tower.
Agree to accompany Meredith to her father's farmstead.
Harvest all the smaller nodes around the huge crystal formation.
Activate either of the two lewd crystals.
Smash all of Svein's purple barrels.
Refuse Svein's offer to barrelcide the barrels.
Accept Svein's offer to barrelcide the barrels.
Discover all snowglobes and their hot memories.
Complete the Riddlemaster's challenge with a perfect score.
Complete Wulfric's challenge without cheating in any of the bouts.
Learn your fortune and fate from Lizbeth.
